mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NONENEWDB ( RENTAL_YEAR, RENTAL_MONTH, RENTAL_DAY, RENTAL_TIME, RETURN_YEAR, RETURN_MONTH, RETURN_DAY, RETURN_TIME, INSURANCE, CAR_TYPE,BOOKNUM ) VALUES ( #{RENTAL_YEAR}, #{RENTAL_MONTH}, #{RENTAL_DAY}, #{RENTAL_TIME}, #{RETURN_YEAR}, #{RETURN_MONTH}, #{RETURN_DAY}, #{RETURN_TIME}, #{INSURANCE}, #{CAR_TYPE}, book_seq.nextval() )
